content.refrain:
Come hack to me with all your heart.
Don't let fear keep us apart.
verses:
Trees do bend though straight and tall:
must we to others call.

The wilderness will lead you to your heart
where I will speak. Long have I waited for

your coming home tome and living deeply
our new life.

Integrity and justice with tenderness you
shail know.

You shall sleep secure with peace;
faithfulness will be your joy.
